info.name: Users Service - Smart Meeting Room Dana Kossaybati Reem Hamdar
info.description:
Complete API collection for Users Service with authentication, authorization, and profile management

Author: Dana Kossaybati

request.description: Register a new user with valid credentials. Password must be strong (8+ chars, uppercase, lowercase, number).
Attempt to register with duplicate username - should return 409 Conflict.
Attempt registration with weak password - should fail validation.
Attempt registration with weak password - should fail validation.

response.name: Register User - Invalid Email

request.description: Login with valid credentials. Token is automatically saved to collection variable.
Attempt login with wrong password - should return 401 Unauthorized.
Attempt login with wrong password - should return 401 Unauthorized.
Get own profile using Bearer token from login.
Get own profile using Bearer token from login.
Attempt to access another user's profile - should be forbidden.
Update user profile email and full name.
Update user profile email and full name.
Update user profile email and full name.

response.name: Update Profile with Invalid Email

request.description: Update user profile email and full name.

response.name: Update Other User Profile
response.body:

request.description: Update user profile email and full name.
Delete user account (permanent operation).
Login as admin to get admin token for privileged operations.
Get all users (admin only). Use admin token from previous request.
